metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15602 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In GNU Libextractor 1.4, there is an integer signedness error for the chunk size in the EXTRACTOR_nsfe_extract_method function in plugins/nsfe_extractor.c, leading to an infinite loop for a crafted size. It was discovered that Libextractor incorrectly handled integers. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libextractor package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
